Purpose: High-level project status and key decisions
Agenda Topics: Project health, milestones, risks, decisions needed
Success Metrics: Report delivered on time and decisions made
Notes: Executive summary format with dashboard

Agenda Topics: Strategic decisions, major risks, budget, timeline
Success Metrics: Meeting attendance >80% and decisions documented
Notes: Decision-making authority for scope and budget

Agenda Topics: Yesterday's progress, today's plan, blockers
Success Metrics: Daily attendance >90% and blockers resolved
Notes: Keep focused on impediments and coordination

Agenda Topics: Architecture decisions, technical risks, design changes
Success Metrics: Design decisions made and documented
Notes: Include architectural decision records (ADRs)

Agenda Topics: New risks, mitigation status, risk escalation
Key Stakeholders: EO Project Manager and Risk Committee
Success Metrics: Risk register updated and mitigations on track
Notes: Focus on high and critical risks

Agenda Topics: Requirements review, prototype feedback, acceptance criteria
Success Metrics: User sign-off on requirements and prototypes
Notes: Include hands-on demonstrations and feedback

Agenda Topics: Sprint achievements, demo, retrospective feedback
Success Metrics: Sprint goals achieved and feedback incorporated
Notes: Include live demonstration of working features

Agenda Topics: Vendor deliverables, integration progress, issues
Success Metrics: Vendor commitments met and issues resolved
Notes: Track vendor SLAs and deliverables

Agenda Topics: Test execution status, defect metrics, quality gates
Success Metrics: Quality gates met and defects within tolerance
Notes: Include test coverage and defect trend analysis

Agenda Topics: Change requests, impact assessment, approval decisions
Success Metrics: Change requests processed within SLA
Notes: Follow formal change management process

Agenda Topics: Training development, delivery schedule, readiness assessment
Success Metrics: Training materials ready and delivery on schedule
Notes: Include training effectiveness measurements

Agenda Topics: Security assessments, compliance status, vulnerabilities
Success Metrics: Security requirements met and risks mitigated
Notes: Include penetration testing and compliance audits

Agenda Topics: Environment status, performance metrics, capacity planning
Success Metrics: Infrastructure ready and performance targets met
Notes: Include capacity planning and monitoring metrics

Agenda Topics: Change readiness, training completion, support preparation
Success Metrics: Business readiness criteria met and users prepared
Notes: Include user adoption and change readiness metrics

Agenda Topics: Go-live checklist, readiness validation, contingency planning
Key Stakeholders: All Team Leads and EO Engineer
Success Metrics: Go-live criteria met and contingency plans ready
Notes: Intensive coordination before go-live event

Agenda Topics: Performance review, lessons learned, optimization opportunities
Key Stakeholders: Core Project Team and Business Stakeholders
Success Metrics: Lessons captured and improvement actions identified
Notes: Include benefits realization and user satisfaction

Agenda Topics: Issue description, impact assessment, resolution actions
Success Metrics: Issue resolved within SLA and communication timely
Notes: Follow incident management procedures

Purpose: General project updates and milestone communication
Agenda Topics: Project progress, upcoming milestones, recognition
Success Metrics: Stakeholder engagement and awareness maintained
Notes: Include project achievements and team recognition

Purpose: Technical knowledge sharing and problem solving
Agenda Topics: Technical challenges, solution design, knowledge transfer
Success Metrics: Technical issues resolved and knowledge shared
Notes: Include architectural decisions and best practices

Purpose: Client project status and milestone updates
Agenda Topics: Progress update, milestone status, next steps
Success Metrics: Client satisfaction maintained and expectations managed
Notes: Professional client communication with clear next steps
